*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. E. B. Austin to E. M. Perry, March [May] 24, 1827. Austin's part in putting down rebellion. Immigration from Ohio. Slavery.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-24-1827">24th March [May] 1827.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*My Dr *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*A considerable period has elapsed since I had the pleasure of receiving a letter from my dear *person_mentioned*Emily*/person_mentioned*—Can an absence of only a few years, entirely have obliterated from her memory a *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned* she onced loved! What can be the cause of her long silence ? perhaps she is so much engaged in her domestic duties that she cannot "steal" time to devote a few leisure moments to her *person_mentioned*Brown*/person_mentioned*, Excuse me *person_mentioned*sister */person_mentioned*for reproaching you for your negligence for I assure you I have been much hurt at your long silence. You perhaps think I am hardly justifiable, in blaming you for a fault you think I am equally censurable for but on this point I can satisfy you—For the last year I have been absent from the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*—and in a *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* where there was no mode of conveying a letter to the *location_mentioned*U. S*/location_mentioned*—Shortly after my arrival I wrote you from *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*, and since then I have been anxiously expecting a letter from you—*/p*
*p*You have no doubt heard long since, the happy termination of the disturbances on this *location_mentioned*frontier */location_mentioned*and the conspicuous part Our *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*acted in bringing to a close so unnatural rebellion—At this time the utmost harmony prevails in every part of this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, and so far we are blessed with a prospect of a plentiful harvest in a healthy season,*/p*
*p*We are not entirely forgotten by our *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*in the north*/location_mentioned* a few days since we received a lenthy letter from *person_mentioned*Henry Austin*/person_mentioned* dated in *location_mentioned*New York*/location_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Stephen */person_mentioned*has answered it and recommen[d]ed him to come and see the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*and I think he will be out in the fall— My sole wish is to see our scattered *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*once more United and I think there is some little prospect of their being so provided *person_mentioned*Henry */person_mentioned*is pleased with the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*I have nothing new to communicate—we have a prospect of a considerable emigration from *location_mentioned*Ohio*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1827">next fall*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*Our State constitution is to be published in this place on the *date_mentioned n="05-29-1827">29th*/date_mentioned*. inst it is an excellent one—no *person_mentioned*slaves */person_mentioned*are permitted to be introduced *date_mentioned n="11-29-1827">6 months after its publication*/date_mentioned*, which will give until the *date_mentioned n="11-29-1827">29th of next November*/date_mentioned* to introduce them—No person can be born a *person_mentioned*slave */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*after the publication of the Constitution. If there are any *person_mentioned*persons */person_mentioned*in your part of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*having *person_mentioned*Slaves*/person_mentioned*, that wish to remove here—hurry them on before the expiration of the time—*/p*
*p*I wish you to write me a lengthy letter and give me all the *location_mentioned*Neighbourhood */location_mentioned*news Any thing is interesting to me at this immense distance from you. Tell me something about *person_mentioned*Elias's family.*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mary*/person_mentioned* —*person_mentioned*Adaline*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Eliza*/person_mentioned*—and *person_mentioned*Maria*/person_mentioned*—remember me to them affectionately I never hear from them—I suppose they have forgotten me too. *person_mentioned*Moses */person_mentioned*has lost a fortune by not comeing out to this *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*in time— tho it is not too late—if he comes by *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1827">fall*/date_mentioned*—Remember me affectionately to my little *person_mentioned*Nephews */person_mentioned*and kiss my dear little " blue eyed *person_mentioned*Mary*/person_mentioned* " for me—My respects to *person_mentioned*Mr Perry*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned*sends his love to you and will write you by this opportunity—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jas B Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mrs. Emily M. Perry */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*Potosi, Mail Missouri*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
